## NS.sleep() method

Suspends the script for n milliseconds.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sleep(millis: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                      |
| --------- | ------ | -------------------------------- |
| millis    | number | Number of milliseconds to sleep. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0 GB
